ratings.comment: Truly one of the greatest educators I have ever known.  I was very sorry to hear of Dr. Harris' passing, and hope that he will be remembered for all that he did for all of us.

The best professor and person on campus.  He is fun, gentle and warm.  He was fair and really learned a lot from him.  I wish every professor could be of the same quality.  He told some great stories and jokes.  Sometimes he likes to pick on his students, but that's how you knew he liked you.   And oh yeah, great accent and great sense of style.

My favorite professor on campus!  Phonetics is a Difficult class, but if you keep up with the material and don't miss lecture you should be fine.   He is very clear and very helpful.  Best of all he is funny and has the best British accent ever.

I am surprised people have written such nice things!  I did learn alot but if you miss a step or if something is hard for you to understand it is impossible to catch up! He was mean and insulting to me and people I talked to felt the same way.  You need to kiss up to him to make it.  Once I asked for help before an exam and I couldn't make his offi

Ray Harris is one of the best professors I have ever had at Madison. He really knows what he is talking about and conveys everything easily. I highly recommend him for any spanish class. Best of all, he is fun and makes class interesting.

Great professor!  I would highly reccomend taking a class from him if at all possible.  He is really clear at explaining the material and the exams are really fair.  As long as you stay on top of the material, the class should go smoothly!
Amazing. Best professor i've ever had. Clear, calm, funny.
Really funny, knowledgeable.  Show that you are interested in the subject.  He likes to make fun of students so don't take it the wrong way.  One of the best profs I had.
